sen.e: Iwao KONGO (1886 to 1951) was a Noh actor of the shite-kata Kongo school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).

sen.j: 1937年、金剛右京の死去により坂戸金剛家が断絶したのを受け、翌1937年、他の四流の家元の推薦により金剛流家元となり、宗家継承。
sen.e: In 1937, when the Sakado Kongo family line was ended due to the death of Ukyo KONGO, he was recommended as the headmaster of the Kongo school by those of the other four schools, and succeeded to the head family of the school.
